meta.title: PrimeTyne 4 Putters | Buy Milled Putters Online | Ping PLD
meta.description: PLD PrimeTyne 4 putter is a premium milled putter which is designed to provide a stable and accurate game. Get fitted for yours now.

pageBanner.title: PrimeTyne 4
pageBanner.description: Mallets by design are highly forgiving, the PrimeTyne model being a popular choice for its heel-toe balance that leads to improved accuracy. The PLD PrimeTyne 4 has a slightly more compact profile than other PrimeTyne models. We’ve given it a deep milling pattern on the face to deliver a solid feel and sound. The heel-side “flow neck” hosel fits a strong-arc stroke type.

expertReviewSection.title: Expert review.
expertReviewSection.description: Learn what Viktor Hovland has to say about the Anser 2.

sections.title: Heel-toe weighting
sections.description: Perimeter weighting stabilizes the head to prevent twisting, which elevates MOI to improve forgiveness and accuracy.

sections.title: Flow-neck hosel
sections.description: Entering heel side, the “flow-neck” hosel is positioned in a way that promotes a strong-arc stroke rotation.

sections.title: Ball-width alignment
sections.description: The single alignment line paired with the ball-width cavity geometry guide the eye to help make aiming easy.

grips.title: PP58 Midsize
grips.description: Standard-sized pistol shape is designed to make it easier to square the face at impact.

grips.title: PP58 S
grips.description: Straight-taper, midsized pistol with larger flat surfaces for increased face awareness.

grips.title: PP60
grips.description: Midsize pistol-shaped design with a rubber under-listing has larger flat surfaces for increased face awareness.

grips.title: Armlock
grips.description: This sleek 21" grip has a longer profile to provide multiple hand-placement options. The comfortable, tacky Excel polymer uses multiple tread patterns for accentuating feel.
